Package Controller

Class CineplexController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.DataController
      • Controller.CineplexController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    public final class CineplexController
extends DataController
    This class contains static method to read data from file and to manipulate data from files.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static boolean initialize()
        This method initializes and read all the necessary data from the files and store it inside the variables if the files exist Else if the files do not exist it will create files and initialize required data.
        Returns:
        true if there is no error. false otherwise

      • verification

        public static boolean verification​(java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String password)
        The method is to verify whether the username and the password are valid.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        Returns:
        true if the username exists and the corresponding password is correct, false otherwise

      • getMovieByTitle

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Movie> getMovieByTitle​(java.lang.String title)
        This method is to get the search result by matching the movie title.
        Parameters:
        title - the movie title to be searched
        Returns:
        the list of movies ArrayList<Movie> whose title contains the searched input, returns an empty array if no movie with input title exists.
